Rulings.Tengu:
●The effect to increase this card’s ATK is resolved only if you place a Spell Counter.
●This effect targets the card you place a Spell Counter on.
●You cannot place a Spell Counter on this card. If “Skill Drain” is activated, this card loses any ATK gained from its own effect.
●If a card like “Breaker the Magical Warrior” is having its effect negated, you cannot place a Spell Counter on it with this effect.
●If the target of this effect is face-down when the effect resolves, no Spell Counter is placed and no ATK is gained.

Rulings.Base:
1. The effect to increase this card's ATK is resolved only if you place a Spell Counter.
2. This effect targets the card you place a Spell Counter on.
3. You cannot place a Spell Counter on this card.
4. If "Skill Drain" is activated, this card loses any ATK gained from its own effect.
5. If a card like "Breaker the Magical Warrior" is having its effect negated, you cannot place a Spell Counter on it with this effect.
6. If the target of this effect is face-down when the effect resolves, no Spell Counter is placed and no ATK is gained.
